patthana5.1:2.1.pli: Kusalaṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.1:3.1.pli: Akusalaṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.1:4.1.pli: Abyākataṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.1:5.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ …pe… sahajātavārampi …pe… sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṃ.)

patthana5.1:6.1.pli: Kusalo sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo kusalassa sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana5.1:7.1.pli: Akusalo sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo akusalassa sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana5.1:8.1.pli: Abyākato sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo abyākatassa sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana5.1:9.1.pli: Kusalo sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo kusalassa sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.1:10.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā satta, anantare samanantare pañca, sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye nava, āsevane tīṇi, kamme pañca, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre …pe… sampayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.1:12.1.pli: Akusalaṃ dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.1:13.1.pli: Akusalaṃ dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.

patthana5.1:14.1.pli: Abyākataṃ dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.1:15.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) (Sahajātavārampi …pe… sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṃ.)

patthana5.1:16.1.pli: Akusalo dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo akusalassa dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana5.1:17.1.pli: Akusalo dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo akusalassa dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.

patthana5.1:18.1.pli: Abyākato dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo akusalassa dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.1:19.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā ekaṃ, anantare …pe… nissaye dve, upanissaye cattāri, āsevane ekaṃ, kamme tīṇi, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre indriye dve, jhāne magge ekaṃ, sampayutte …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.1:21.1.pli: Kusalaṃ adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.1:22.1.pli: Akusalaṃ adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.1:23.1.pli: Abyākataṃ adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.1:24.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.1:26.1.pli: Kusalo adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo kusalassa adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana5.1:27.1.pli: Akusalo adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo akusalassa adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana5.1:28.1.pli: Abyākato adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo abyākatassa adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.1:29.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā satta, anantare satta …pe… sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye nava, āsevane tīṇi, kamme pañca, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre …pe… sampayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.1:31.1.pli: Abyākataṃ vipākaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato vipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.1:32.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.1:34.1.pli: Kusalaṃ vipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo vipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.1:35.1.pli: Akusalaṃ vipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo vipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.1:36.1.pli: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.1:38.1.pli: Kusalo vipākadhammadhammo kusalassa vipākadhammadhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana5.1:39.1.pli: Akusalo vipākadhammadhammo akusalassa vipākadhammadhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana5.1:40.1.pli: Kusalo vipākadhammadhammo kusalassa vipākadhammadhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Kusalo vipākadhammadhammo akusalassa vipākadhammadhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.

patthana5.1:41.1.pli: Akusalo vipākadhammadhammo akusalassa vipākadhammadhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Akusalo vipākadhammadhammo kusalassa vipākadhammadhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.1:42.1.pli: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare dve …pe… sahajāte dve, aññamaññe nissaye dve, upanissaye cattāri, āsevane kamme dve …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.1:44.1.pli: Abyākataṃ nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.1:45.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.1:47.1.pli: Abyākataṃ upādinnupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato upādinnupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.1:50.1.pli: Kusalaṃ anupādinnupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana5.1:51.1.pli: Akusalaṃ anupādinnupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana5.1:52.1.pli: Abyākataṃ anupādinnupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.1:53.1.pli: Kusalaṃ anupādinnupādāniyañca abyākataṃ anupādinnupādāniyañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.1:54.1.pli: Akusalaṃ anupādinnupādāniyañca abyākataṃ anupādinnupādāniyañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.1:55.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.1:57.1.pli: Kusalo anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo kusalassa anupādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana5.1:58.1.pli: Akusalo anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo akusalassa anupādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana5.1:59.1.pli: Abyākato anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo abyākatassa anupādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana5.1:60.1.pli: Kusalo anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo kusalassa anupādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana5.1:61.1.pli: Akusalo anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo akusalassa anupādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana5.1:62.1.pli: Abyākato anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo abyākatassa anupādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.1:63.1.pli: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare samanantare pañca, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye upanissaye nava, purejāte pacchājāte āsevane tīṇi, kamme …pe… magge satta, sampayutte vippayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate ekādasa. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.1:65.1.pli: Kusalaṃ anupādinnaanupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.1:66.1.pli: Abyākataṃ anupādinnaanupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato anupādinnaanupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.1:67.1.pli: Hetuyā dve …pe… āsevane ekaṃ …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ, sahajātavārampi …pe… pañhāvārampi sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana5.1:68.1.pli: Akusalaṃ saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.1:71.1.pli: Kusalaṃ asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana5.1:72.1.pli: Abyākataṃ asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.1:73.1.pli: Kusalaṃ asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikañca abyākataṃ asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.1:74.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sahajātavārepi …pe… pañhāvārepi sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana5.1:75.1.pli: Kusalaṃ asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.1:76.1.pli: Abyākataṃ asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.1:77.1.pli: Hetuyā dve …pe… āsevane ekaṃ …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.1:79.1.pli: Kusalaṃ savitakkasavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo savitakkasavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.1:80.1.pli: Akusalaṃ savitakkasavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo savitakkasavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.1:81.1.pli: Abyākataṃ savitakkasavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato savitakkasavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.1:82.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.1:84.1.pli: Kusalo savitakkasavicāro dhammo kusalassa savitakkasavicārassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana5.1:85.1.pli: Akusalo savitakkasavicāro dhammo akusalassa savitakkasavicārassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana5.1:86.1.pli: Abyākato savitakkasavicāro dhammo abyākatassa savitakkasavicārassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.1:87.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā …pe… samanantare satta, sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye nava, āsevane tīṇi, kamme pañca, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre …pe… sampayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvāraṃ evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)

patthana5.1:88.1.pli: Kusalaṃ avitakkavicāramattaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo avitakkavicāramatto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.1:89.1.pli: Abyākataṃ avitakkavicāramattaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato avitakkavicāramatto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.1:90.1.pli: Hetuyā dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.1:92.1.pli: Kusalaṃ avitakkaavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo avitakkaavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana5.1:93.1.pli: Abyākataṃ avitakkaavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato avitakkaavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.1:94.1.pli: Kusalaṃ avitakkaavicārañca abyākataṃ avitakkaavicārañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato avitakkaavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.1:95.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.1:97.1.pli: Kusalaṃ pītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.1:98.1.pli: Akusalaṃ pītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.1:99.1.pli: Abyākataṃ pītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.1:100.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.1:102.1.pli: Kusalo pītisahagato dhammo kusalassa pītisahagatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana5.1:103.1.pli: Akusalo pītisahagato dhammo akusalassa pītisahagatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana5.1:104.1.pli: Abyākato pītisahagato dhammo abyākatassa pītisahagatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.1:105.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā satta, anantare pañca …pe… sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye nava, āsevane tīṇi, kamme pañca, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre …pe… sampayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.1:107.1.pli: Kusalaṃ sukhasahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.1:108.1.pli: Akusalaṃ sukhasahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.1:109.1.pli: Abyākataṃ sukhasahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.1:110.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.1:112.1.pli: Kusalaṃ upekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.1:113.1.pli: Akusalaṃ upekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.1:114.1.pli: Abyākataṃ upekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.1:115.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.1:117.1.pli: Akusalaṃ dassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.1:120.1.pli: Akusalaṃ bhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.1:122.1.pli: Kusalaṃ nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana5.1:123.1.pli: Abyākataṃ nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.1:124.1.pli: Kusalaṃ nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbañca abyākataṃ nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.1:125.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca …pe… ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sahajātavārepi …pe… pañhāvārepi sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana5.1:126.1.pli: Akusalaṃ dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.1:128.1.pli: Akusalaṃ bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.1:130.1.pli: Kusalaṃ nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.1:131.1.pli: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate satta. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sahajātavārepi …pe… pañhāvārepi sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana5.1:132.1.pli: Kusalaṃ ācayagāmiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo ācayagāmī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.1:276.1.pli: Akusalaṃ bahiddhā ca abyākataṃ bahiddhā ca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato bahiddhā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.1:277.1.pli: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.1:279.1.pli: Kusalo bahiddhā dhammo kusalassa bahiddhā dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana5.1:280.1.pli: Akusalo bahiddhā dhammo akusalassa bahiddhā dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana5.1:281.1.pli: Abyākato bahiddhā dhammo abyākatassa bahiddhā dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.1:282.1.pli: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā dasa …pe… avigate terasa. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Yathā kusalattike pañhāvāraṃ evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)

patthana5.1:283.1.pli: Kusalaṃ ajjhattārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.1:284.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.1:285.1.pli: Kusalaṃ bahiddhārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.1:286.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.1:287.1.pli: Abyākataṃ anidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato anidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.1:290.1.pli: Kusalaṃ anidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṃ anidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṃ anidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo anidassanaappaṭigho ca abyākato anidassanaappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana5.1:291.1.pli: Akusalaṃ anidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana5.1:292.1.pli: Abyākataṃ anidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.1:293.1.pli: Kusalaṃ anidassanaappaṭighañca abyākataṃ anidassanaappaṭighañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.1:294.1.pli: Akusalaṃ anidassanaappaṭighañca abyākataṃ anidassanaappaṭighañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.1:295.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sahajātavārampi …pe… sampayuttavārampi pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṃ.)
